assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Dr Najaf Amin is supported by the Netherlands Brain Foundation (project number F2013(1)-28). Dr Gregory J Tranah was supported by NIA grant R01AG030474. Dr Henning Tiemeier was supported by the Vidi Grant of ZonMw (the Netherlands Organization for Health Research and Development, 2009-017.106.370). All other authors report no biomedical financial interests or potential conflicts of interest.
